alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Martin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Lucie and eastern Martin Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Port Salerno, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Walton, Stuart, Jupiter Island, Palm City and Hobe Sound. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Martin
